Name: Buddy Rock
LongDescription: Slightly boosts Defense and Special Defense. Keep it in the Treasure Bag to give its benefit to all of these team members: Igglybuff, Jigglypuff, and Wigglytuff.  Swap a Wiggly-Hair and a Wiggly-Card for a Buddy Rock at the Croagunk Swap Shop.  See what happens if you collect all three of these items!
